steps.step1: Hum aapko aapke WhatsApp number par messages bhejenge.
steps.step2: Hum aapko hafte mein do baar messages bhejenge - Budhvaar (Wednesday) aur Ravivaar (Sunday).
steps.step3: Agar aapka mann badal jaye, toh aap kabhi bhi unsubscribe ya resubscribe kar sakte hain.

form.subscribeTitle: Subscribe kariye Notes from Bloom ke messages ke liye.

subscribeErrors.invalidNumber: Apka phone number amaanya prateet hota hai. appears to be invalid. Kriya jo bhi error hai usko theek karein aur firse prayas kariye.
subscribeErrors.internal: WhatsApp ko subscribe karne mein error aa raha hai. Kripya dubara prayas kariye aur agar yeh error firse aye toh humari <contactLink>Bloom team ko message kariye</contactLink>.
subscribeErrors.alreadyExists: Apke user ke liye WhatsApp subscription pehle se he ho rakha hai. Yadi yeh ek galti hai, toh kripya <contactLink>Bloom team ko message kariye</contactLink>.

unsubscribeErrors.internal: There was an error unsubscribing from WhatsApp. Try again later and <contactLink>message the Bloom team</contactLink> if you're still getting this error.
